title: Stanley Kubrick's "Bary Lyndon" movie poster
content:
does anyone know what font was used on Stanley Kubrick's "Bary Lyndon" movie poster

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [barry\_lyndon.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091753/http:/typophile.com/files/barry_lyndon.jpg) | 10.85 KB |
author: alchion

comments.content: Probably hand drawn, but it's got that Ed Benguiat flavour. Did you try searching on Typophile?

There was a [previous thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091753/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4136) about this. You should try searching before posting, you'd be surprised.

BTW, I find it better to use google to search Typophile than the inbuilt search, using the "site:typophile.com" thingy. :^)
Works like a charm indeed. I hadn't even noticed the search function had been restored. You'd expect the guys in charge to at least warn the moderators... :^/
